content.text: Hi, how are you?
Hey, I'm good! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to play guitar. It's so relaxing and I can express myself.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn to play an instrument.
You should! It's really fun.
I know, I know. I keep telling myself I'm going to start lessons, but I just haven't gotten around to it.
Well, whenever you do, I'm sure you'll be great at it!
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love to read. It's like traveling to another world and I can forget about all my troubles.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I especially love historical fiction.
Me too! I love learning about different time periods and cultures.
What's your favorite historical fiction book?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I think I would have to say The Pillars of the Earth by Ken Follett.
That's a great book! I loved that one too.
It was so good! I'm a sucker for historical fiction set in medieval times.
Me too! I love the way the author brings the world to life.
I know, right? It's like you're actually there.
Exactly
